## 

```{r}
#| label: mailroom
#| 
library(deSolve)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| label: conditions
#| 
parameters <- c(a = 1/150, b = 4.5, c = 4, d = 0.03)

state <- c(X = 0)

dxdt <-function(t, state, parameters) {
  with(as.list(c(state, parameters)),{
  # rate of change
  dX <- a - (((b*X + c*X + d*X ) * 1/150 ) /  8.8)

 # return the rate of change
  list(c(dX))
 })
}  
times <- seq(0, 700, by = 1)
```

```{r}
#| label: solution
#| 
out <- ode(y = state, times = times, func = dxdt, parms = parameters)
plot(out, xlab = "time", ylab = "-")
```
